summary: A new craftable armor/outfit found under leather and misc categories for light armor and cloth outfit respectively. Available in UNP, CBBE, CBBE-BBP, CBBE-TBBP and BodySlide. 4K and 1K texture resolutions also available for download.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#EBF1DD][size=4][i][font=Times New Roman][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1414085601.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412459723.png[/img]

The HDT versions of the mod require [b]HDT High Heels System[/b]. Get it [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]here[/url][/b]!

(T)BBP Versions require a (T)BBP/HDT supported body, skeleton and animations or xml.

For the recipes to appear in the crafting interface you need to have the crafting manual in your inventory!

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413993725.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412459723.png[/img]

A new craftable armor/outfit found under leather and misc categories for light armor and cloth outfit respectively.

The outfit features the Necromancer's Grip enchant that makes the wearer move quietly and damage all nearby opponents with 5 points of poison damage per second. Also reduces the cost of conjuration spells by 25% and increases magicka regen by 150%.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1414713821.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412462830.png[/img]
[youtube]CRaPV-xOxRA[/youtube] [youtube]97i4P1-lFE4[/youtube]
[youtube]-2vTXrM_dlU[/youtube] [youtube]9xfbbW8F1q0[/youtube]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1414088619.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412459723.png[/img]

This is the eighth armor of a series that will hopefully reach twenty four armors. The idea originated from Minidresses Collection mod by Tiwa44 who did an awesome job converting some of the long dresses to mini versions.

These armors will not offer any protection in real life so don't use them at home!

There is no guarantee that all the armors will be finished but the creation has been fun so far and there are no plans of stopping.

[b]A big THANK YOU here to all of you guys that endorsed,commented or just played and keep playing using this and the previous mods![/b]

Below are eight different mini dresses by Tiwa44 and the progress with the armors. The image will be updated every time something major changes.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1442736357.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412460420.png[/img]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413991302.png[/img]

If for any reason you can't find the book, type help "Sotteta Necromancer Crafting Manual" and player.additem xxxxxxxx 1 in the console to get the recipe book manually.
Also if you want to avoid gathering the materials, there are enough materials inside the bag of crafting supplies to create each of the recipes once.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413848639.png[/img]

- 4K Textures

- 4K Black Retexture

- 1K Textures

- CBBE Bodyslide Files

- German Translation

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413994297.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412746639.png[/img]
[color=#EBF1DD][size=4][i][font=Times New Roman][url=http://robton.nu/]
UNPB BBP and 7B Bombshell conversions[/url] by Robton.[/font][/i][/size][/color]

SevenBase conversion by RickerHK.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59380/?]Sotteta Necromancer SevenBase 7B TBBP by RickerHK[/url].

7B HDT:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68522/?]7B HDT Sotteta Necromancer sevenbase by Gamefever[/url]

UNPB:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69709/?]MiniArmorsCollection - UNPB by gutris1[/url]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412746640.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt[/url] for the HDT version.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412746640.png[/img]

Using HDT Version without HDT High Heels System will cause your game to crash.
Due to the many transparencies of the armors, blood spills appear in places they shouldn't.
One workaround is to use the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url] and set the wounds duration to a minimum.
If you are using HDT HighHeels System and you see weird numbers at the top left of your screen disable the debug info as shown below.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401335443.jpg[/img] [img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1405232089.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412507195.png[/img]

a) Using the nexus mod manager
b) Manual by extracting the contents of the compressed file in the Skyrim/Data folder

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412507195.png[/img]

a) Using the nexus mod manager
b) Manual by deleting Sotteta Necromancer Outfit.esp from the Skyrim/Data folder
and by deleting the folders [b]Sotteta Necromancer[/b] inside the Skyrim/Data/Textures/DX/MiniArmorsCollection/ and Skyrim/Data/Meshes/DX/MiniArmorsCollection/ folders.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1413993725.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412460007.png[/img]

Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]
Face: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race by Seren4XX HelloSanta Urshi and co[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr Dave[/url]
Textures: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania by tetrodoxin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54118/?]The Neith Team Warpaints Set by ElaNeith[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture by Xs2reality[/url]
Hair: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?]KS Hairdos - 265 by Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos[/url]
ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB by SkyrimTuner[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50501/]The Grim and Somber ENBS by WolfGrimDark[/url]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412460007.png[/img]

If you want to use any of the non vanilla meshes of this mod please credit/contact the original creators listed bellow. Anything else you can use freely as long as you credit our work in the comments.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412460007.png[/img]

Armor meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection by Tiwa44[/url]
Stockings, gloves, boots meshes are based on the awesome meshes by Petrovich.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]UNP Undies by Petrovich[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24474/?]UNP Leather Clothes by Petrovich[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36393/?]UNP High Heels by Petrovich[/url]

Many thanks to:

The team behind [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 & Outfit Studio[/url] - without which the CBBE versions would not have been possible.

TKHBMVP for the German translation! [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4827500/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Nexus Resources[/url], [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=298040664] Steam Resources[/url]

Bethesda that made all this possible.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1413864954.png[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413866875.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69138/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1442736710.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68653/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1439287909.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67952/?][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1437281401.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67595/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1436265048.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67180/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1435216507.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66967/?][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1434516218.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-2-1419535175.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60195/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1416902361.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59451/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1415093656.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59202/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413866635.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412409808.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58205/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1410911872.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57909/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-5-1410097182.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56998/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1408006976.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1408006976.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54423/?][img]http://static author: Deserter X - Mitosuke

files.name: A. Sotteta Necromancer 2K UNP HDT
files.changelogHtml:
Added the missing upgrade option for the non-HDT boots.
Fixed a surface attribute for all the gloves.

files.name: B. Sotteta Necromancer 2K UNP
files.changelogHtml:
Added the missing upgrade option for the non-HDT boots.
Fixed a surface attribute for all the gloves.

files.name: D. Sotteta Necromancer 2k - CBBE
files.changelogHtml: CBBE versions only: Gloves no longer cause fingers to 'extend' and clip through the palms when unarmed or display wonky and broken fingers while using magic.

files.name: C. Sotteta Necromancer 2k - CBBE HDT
files.changelogHtml: CBBE versions only: Gloves no longer cause fingers to 'extend' and clip through the palms when unarmed or display wonky and broken fingers while using magic.
